# amirghamari.ir

> Personal portfolio of Amir Hossein Ghamari, a freelance backend developer and programming instructor based in Guilan, Iran.

## Summary

Amir Hossein Ghamari is a backend developer with over 5 years of experience, specializing in Laravel and scalable web architecture. He has developed robust APIs and custom tools, focusing on performance and scalability.

## Skills and Competencies

- **Backend Development**: PHP, Laravel, MySQL
- **Frontend Technologies**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- **Version Control**: Git
- **Programming Instruction**: Teaching programming concepts and best practices

## Projects

- **Tesmino – PR and Backlink Platform**: Developed and optimized the backend infrastructure, enhancing performance and scalability.
- **Jajiga – Online Booking Platform for Accommodation Rentals**: Optimized backend and database, reducing server load and increasing capacity from ~3,000 to over 50,000 concurrent users.
- **SpyCreed – Online Spyfall Game**: Designed and implemented using Svelte and serverless architecture on Vercel, ensuring fast and scalable performance.

## Education

- **Diploma in Computer Software Engineering**, Shahram Toloui Technical and Vocational High School, 2017

## Languages

- English
- Persian

## Availability

- Open to remote backend development roles
